author: Naylus
title: Nice and Old addition to your Houses
review:
I've just bought this set, and I think I was very lucky to find this rare thing! This one is a cool addition, that allows you to create houses with beautiful doors and nice windows (that can't be found now, they are not sold any longer).

If you have enough bricks, you can create a really awesome house, using the elements of 631. In general this is an additional set, which together with others of this theme, like 633 or 801, allow you to make several more buildings in Lego town.

-Update-
The set includes 2 kinds of red doors – ones for a villa and ones with glass suitable for offices and shops. There 6 small windows, and 8 classic frames with shutters, which are no longer produced by Lego.

These windows with shutters are personally one of my favourites, as they add cosiness to your creations. However, the hinges are quite weak and can break easily over time. I guess, that's the reason for their disappearance from modern sets.
